sourcesContent: import{createPublicClient as t,http as e}from"viem";import{getJsonRpcEndpointFromChain as i}from"../../../utils/eth/getPublicClient.mjs";import"../../../errors.mjs";import"ofetch";const n=async({address:n,chain:r,rpcConfig:s,privyAppId:o})=>{try{let m=t({chain:r,transport:e(i(r,s,o))}),[l,p]=await Promise.all([m.readContract({abi:a,address:n,functionName:"symbol"}),m.readContract({abi:a,address:n,functionName:"decimals"})]);return{decimals:p,symbol:l}}catch(t){return console.log(t),null}};let a=[{inputs:[],name:"decimals",outputs:[{internalType:"uint8",name:"",type:"uint8"}],stateMutability:"view",type:"function"},{inputs:[],name:"symbol",outputs:[{internalType:"string",name:"",type:"string"}],stateMutability:"view",type:"function"}];export{n as getErc20TokenInfo};
